# zitadel_action_execution_response (Resource)

Resource representing an action execution triggered by a response.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Optional

- `all` (Boolean) Trigger on all responses.
- `method` (String) The gRPC method to trigger on, e.g., `/zitadel.session.v2.SessionService/ListSessions`
- `service` (String) The gRPC service to trigger on, e.g., `zitadel.session.v2.SessionService`
- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
